scripts.test:all: rm -rf allure-results allure-report && cypress run --env allure=true
scripts.test:login: rm -rf allure-results allure-report && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/LoginTests.cy.ts' --env allure=true
scripts.test:index: rm -rf allure-results allure-report && cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/IndexTests.cy.ts' --env allure=true
scripts.report:allure: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
